sections.title: Context & Role in Aegis IAM
sections.goal: Establish the interviewee's direct responsibilities, familiarity with enterprise SSO, RBAC, and JIT access in the operational phase.
sample_questions: Can you walk me through your day-to-day responsibilities in operating Aegis IAM?
How do you ensure compliance with POL-SEC-001 in your workflows?
What are the main operational challenges you've encountered since moving to the 'Operate' phase?

sections.title: Threat Modeling & Vulnerability Management
sections.goal: Assess how the interviewee applies threat modeling to IAM, and manages vulnerabilities in an enterprise SSO environment.
sample_questions: What is your process for identifying and prioritizing threats in Aegis IAM?
How do you integrate vulnerability scan results into your patch management?
Can you give an example where a threat model led you to change an IAM configuration?

sections.title: Cross-Project Security Interactions
sections.goal: Explore multi-hop links between Aegis IAM and other projects like Orion Edge Gateway and Poseidon Networking.
sample_questions: How does Aegis IAM integrate with Orion Edge Gateway's mTLS setup?
What security dependencies exist between IAM policies and Poseidon Networking's zero-trust model?
Have you ever had to coordinate a change across these systems to close a security gap?

sections.title: Incident Response & Runbook Usage
sections.goal: Understand how the interviewee uses runbooks like RB-IAM-075 in real incidents, and how lessons are fed back into procedures.
sample_questions: Describe a time you used RB-IAM-075 in an actual incident.
How do you document deviations from the runbook during a live event?
What metrics do you track post-incident to validate recovery effectiveness?

sections.title: Risk Assessment & Decision-Making
sections.goal: Evaluate the interviewee's ability to make informed security tradeoffs and decisions under constraints, supported by evidence from audits and SLAs.
sample_questions: How do you weigh the risk of delayed access revocation against operational continuity?
Can you walk me through a decision where you had to balance SLA-ORI-02 latency targets with stricter IAM enforcement?
Which findings from AUD-24-Q2 had the most impact on your operational priorities?
